description.en:
In a world torn between the Sky and the Lands, siblings Mia and Sera embark on a quest to reunite with the only family they have ever knownMother Theresa.
Separated by fate, their journey is filled with surprises, wonder, and sorrow.
As they traverse breathtaking landscapes and encounter both friends and foes, they must confront their deepest fears, discover the power of love and hope, and learn to believe in themselves.

Yet hidden within Mia lies a secret that could change their fateand the fate of the entire world.
